Given the large amount of text and limited computational resources, sampling is performed. 10000 lines per file  tip_id_stars are randomly sampled and saved to disk. Its subdevided on 70/30 training and test subsets


```{r}
n_sample<-10000
n_test<-3000
n_training<- n_sample-n_test

load("C:/Downloads/LearningR/CapstoneProjectR/tip_id_stars.RData")
set.seed(47)
sample_tip<-tip_id_stars[sample(1:nrow(tip_id_stars),n_sample),]
index_test<-sample(1:nrow(sample_tip),n_test)
tip_test<-sample_tip[index_test,]
tip_training<-sample_tip[-index_test,]

rm(sample_tip)

nrow(tip_test)
nrow(tip_training)

```

Save our test and training  datasets

```{r}
save (tip_test,file="C:/Downloads/LearningR/CapstoneProjectR/tip_test.RData")
save (tip_training,file="C:/Downloads/LearningR/CapstoneProjectR/tip_training.RData")
```
